t: [EVP-ITC] Re: The Fox

he box, adapted to TV. It uses random sweep. The tuner is from an older VCR=

 Sent: Thursday, July 16, 2009 10:26 AM

x
  > >

  > > Wellll, I didn't realize, this is one that's even had=
 a litter under the grounds shed, and one of the guys used to bring it food=
 and water, so no wonder it's almost tame. Anyway, profound for me, I usual=
ly scare away children, women and animals. Hopefully it's not the usual eat=
hquake sign, that would be scary! If you look at the shadow guy image on th=
e group home page, on his hat is wolf image, and this was just before that =
big Afghan quake, plus it was showing up in the shower window--in the steam=
. I used to do Native American type stuff, so the totem stuff has meaning f=
or me. 
  > > 
  > > Angels and Ghost has a psychic prediction page, and on=
e they had listed, a soviet plane crash just happened--Russian plane, but n=
ot it in Russia, and another is similar to what I'm getting, a big tsunami =
for the east coast. I can't get the guys to give me a straight answer as to=
 what hits in August--if anything. 
  > > 
  > > F-S
  > >

P-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "April Abercrombie" <april@> wrote:

Yep....just as I thought....dust!
  > > >

Seriously, that is awesome Frank. What a beautiful fox too. And that it sta=
yed there when you were filming is amazing. We have foxes from time to time=
